title: What happened to these guys...
content:
Does anyone have info on either Thierry Puyfoulhoux of Présence or Ben Balvanz of Fontalicious. I love both of these designers work but their websites are dead... I emailed T26 to see if Ben was still alive but no response yet. I have a feeling the same for Thierry.

Any info would be most appreciated.

Mikey
author: SuperUltraFabulous

comments.content:
Thierry Puyfoulhoux does seem to be alive and well at [http://www.presencetypo.net/](http://web.archive.org/web/20101101030754/http:/www.presencetypo.net/ "http://www.presencetypo.net/")

Dax

Thierry is alive indeed. His fonts are also available from [FontShop](http://web.archive.org/web/20101101030754/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?mid=61) and [MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20101101030754/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/presencetypo/).

Ben is an open question. It looks to me like his fontalicious.com has been coopted by some ne'er-do-wells.

Okay... I got this link from a web archive that's bad.

[http://www.presencetypo.com/Pages-html/home.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20101101030754/http:/www.presencetypo.com/Pages-html/home.html "http://www.presencetypo.com/Pages-html/home.html")

Thanks Dax & Stephen Coles for the info on Thierry.

I'm bumming it on Ben though... he was my font hero.

Mikey

Have no fear font friends . . . Mr. Balvanz is alive and well and his work will again be available for purchase in the coming weeks . . .

Stuart :D

Thank you so much Stuart... what a relief!  
Alba is like my favorite of all time... glad to hear he is okay and working.

Ben is one of only a few designers that really knows how to pump up the cuteness.

Be sure to post an announcement on Typophile to let everyone know his status!

BTW... I purchased the entire FontDiner collection not that long ago... and I'm luv'in it!!

Mikey

Thanks for the kind words Mikey . . . Glad to hear you're enjoying the fonts . . .

I will indeed be certain to post an announcement as details are available . . .

In the meantime, you can see his recent goings on at the tee shirt company he started called Fan Club Member - [http://www.fanclubmember.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20101101030754/http:/www.fanclubmember.com/ "http://www.fanclubmember.com")

Best,  
Stuart :D
